featureType.name: CSIRO_EconomicFeasibility_AbatementArea_bySA2_maxArea
featureType.title: Maximum potential area of carbon abatement by state (CSIRO/BHP)
featureType.abstract:
Modelled economically feasible 25-year annual average carbon abatement (tCO2) and areas of carbon abatement (ha) for four carbon prices ($), aggregated by Statistical Area 2 (2011) for agricultural land. SA2 is clipped to 100km inland from coastline. Includes modelled maximum potential abatement and area.
Data is reported for three different scenario variables, each with 2-5 settings: • discount rate for net present value (4%, 7%) • establishment costs per hectare ($1000, $2000, $4000, $6000, $8000, $10000) • 5-yearly costs per hectare ($100, $200, $300)
CQL filters have been used to restrict the presented data to the following scenario settings: discount rate (dr) = 4%, establishment cost (ec) = $1000, cost per hectare (ac) = $100.
Carbon prices per tCO2 presented are $35, $50, $60, $80 (cp35_tCO2... cp80_tCO2), with corresponding potential area of abatement per CO2 price scenario (cp35_ha.... cp80_ha). Maximum potential 25-year annual average abatement (max_abate) and maximum potential abatement area (max_area) also shown.
This layer shows the maximum potential area of carbon abatement.
